item.title: Ukulele Time: Greatest Love Of All - Whitney Houston
item.description: Play along video for the song Greatest Love Of All from the channel Ukulele Time. Artist: Whitney Houston. Chords: A7, A7sus4, Bm, D, D6, D7, Daug, Em7, F♯m, G, G6, Gaug.
